subject: BillyMode Test: Which color scheme?
message:
Testing BillyMode end-to-end communication.

For the urgent alert system dashboard we could build, which color scheme do you prefer?

Option A: Red/Orange/Green (traffic light style)
Option B: Blue/Purple/Cyan (cool tones)
Option C: System default (whatever looks good)

This is just a test to verify the communication flow works.
